PreceptDef.label: exalted
PreceptDef.description:
A twisted mind is a sign of holiness. Distrust those who call themselves "sane", for they are just fools.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - The catharsis status will have an increased effect of +60 mood.
 - Upon recovering from a mental break colonists will receive a huge stat bonus to most categories that lasts for a whole day.
